citation.title: A revision of the Ceratopsia or horned dinosaurs.

wikipedia.title: Styracosaurus
wikipedia.summary: Styracosaurus ( ; meaning "spiked lizard" from the Ancient Greek styrax/στύραξ "spike at the butt-end of a spear-shaft" and sauros/σαῦρος "lizard") was a genus of herbivorous ceratopsian dinosaur from the Cretaceous Period (Ca

wikipedia.title: Triceratops
wikipedia.summary: Bearing a large bony frill and three horns on its large four-legged body, and possessing similarities with the modern rhinoceros, Triceratops is one of the most recognizable of all dinosaurs and the best known ceratopsid.
